metadata.title: CVE-2021-41458 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In GPAC MP4Box v1.1.0, there is a stack buffer overflow atsrc/utils/error.c:1769 which leads to a denial of service vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
